titles.title: African-American Civil War Memorial Commemorative Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the African-American Civil War veterans who served with Union forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 5/22/2000--Introduced. African-American Civil War Memorial Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) mint and issue one-dollar silver coins emblematic of the African-American Civil War Memorial in commemoration of African-American Civil War veterans who served with Union forces; and (2) distribute all surcharges from coin sales to the African-American Civil War Memorial Freedom Foundation for construction and maintenance of an African-American Civil War Memorial and Museum.
